attributes.action: Automatic PIP entitlement for people diagnosed with cancer.
attributes.additional_details: Too relieve a little of the stress already being suffered.
attributes.background: Stop putting people through worry of applying and then waiting months for a decision at a time when they are feeling extremely vulnerable, both physically and mentally.

rejection.details:
The Personal Independence Payment is paid to people who have a health condition or disability which causes difficulties with daily living or getting around. PIP is paid based on the difficulties causes by a health condition or disability, but there are not particular conditions which result in PIP being paid. You can read more about eligibility for PIP here: https://www.gov.uk/pip/eligibility

If cancer causes difficulties with daily living or getting around a sufferer could claim for PIP in the same way as someone with another health condition or disability.
